PositionHistory.Title: Java/J2EE Developer
Java/J2EE Developer
Java Developer

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Akshata Kothiwale has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently she is employed as a Java/J2EE Developer at ING Direct. Akshata has extensive knowledge of Hibernate, Spring Framework, Java, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Web Services, Rational ClearCase, JavaScript, HTML, Java Servlets, Java Messaging Service, Cascading Style Sheets, XML, JUnit, JDBC, ECLiPSe, AJAX, Oracle 10G, Oracle, JNDI, IBM WebSphere, UML/OMT, Scrum Methodology, SQL, SOAP, Murex MXML, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Message-Driven Beans, Log4j, JSON, IBM WebSphere Application Server, GUI Applications, FLEX, DHTML, Apache Maven, Ant, XSLT, WebSphere MQ Portal, SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server Integration Services, Oracle PL/SQL, Macromedia Dreamweaver, MDB, Java Authentication and Authorization Service, IBM Hardware, Dojo, Activity Diagrams. So far Akshata has not gained any managerial experience.
